description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: The WPB Show Core WordPress plugin before 2.7 does not sanitise and escape some parameters before outputting them back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin

El complemento wpb-show-core de WordPress anterior a 2.6 no desinfecta ni escapa algunos parámetros antes de devolverlos a la página, lo que genera un cross-site scripting reflejado que podría usarse contra usuarios con privilegios elevados, como el administrador.
